text:
Well before the #COVID19 pandemic, #vaccine hesitancy resulted in lower immunization coverage for many preventable diseases. @umichsph students examine how vaccine hesitancy around polio can shed light on the challenges we now face with COVID-19.

READ: https://t.co/DjxPGTNZEW ⬅️ https://t.co/8gyGBn8fCR
